episode.title: E. I. du Pont de Nemours & Company v. Collins

section.heading: Opinion Announcement of Chief Justice Warren E. Burger

turn.speaker: warren_e_burger
turn.label: Chief Justice Warren E. Burger
turn.text: I have the judgement and opinion of the Court to announce in 75-1870, E. I. Du Pont De Nemours Company against Collins and the related case, Securities and Exchange Commission against Collins, and for reason stated in an opinion of the Court filed this morning.
The judgment of the United States Court of Appeal for the Eighth Circuit is reversed.
Mr. Justice Brennan filed a dissenting opinion.
Mr. Justice Rehnquist took no part in the consideration or decision of this case.
